title: Correct me if im wrong but...
body: Didnt the community want LB reverted? Now all i see on boards is how disgusting LB is....

replies.body: honestly, this lb is pretty strong when ahead (downright broken with magi's), but I think most people who asked for it were at least expecting riot to balance it in the process. I remember posting about if they reverted her they could implement a 0.5-1.5 cooldown on her ult after she uses an ability so you'd have to wait for a bit before unloading your damage (kinda like how they lb rework focused on the timing)
The only people that wanted Leblanc Reverted was Leblanc Abusers. I hate this champ with a passion.
